page.title: 04Shopping
page.content: The survey concentrated upon the shopping habits of the mothers of the children in 'survey' schools.It was found that Thursday was the most popular day for shopping-this is also market day in Stanley.At weekends many families went to larger towns to do the bulk of their shopping.Newcastle and Washington were the most frequently visited towns. Within the close proximity of the area the large supermarkets were found to be much more popular than the local 'corner shop'.Food and clothing were the most common items purchased in both the supermarket and local shop.
